description: This file defines the 'iron-meta' web component for sharing metadata across DOM, including its properties, methods, and internal data management, using Polymer library.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMeta
classes.description: A Polymer element for sharing and retrieving metadata across DOM using a monostate pattern.

classes.name: Polymer.IronMetaQuery
classes.description: A Polymer element for querying metadata stored in IronMeta instances.

methods.name: byKey
methods.description: Retrieves meta data value by key.
